duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide leadership and implementation of core values and overall mission of protecting employees, customers, and assets.
Manage, supervise, and support the growth and development of the team.
Strategic planning and implementation of strategies to create and maintain safe work practices.
Oversee P&L, Fleet, Safety, Equipment Inventory, and Customer Interactions.
Ensure customer service issues are promptly addressed and efficiently resolved.
Utilize site and organization data for workforce forecasting.
Participate in recruiting and hiring strategies in conjunction with Human Resources.
Manage a large staff of field employees and territories covering several hundred square miles.
Invest in the training of new and current employees to reduce turnover and promote efficiency.
Conduct site new hire orientation and ongoing training.
Manage daily employee issues including payroll, timekeeping, benefits, scheduling, and customer issues.
